TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IServerChannelSink implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSinkBase

summary.span: 提供用于安全和传输接收器的方法。

span.span: Provides methods used for security and transport sinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 信道接收器提供插件的点，它允许访问基础消息流经通道，以及传输机制用于将消息发送到的远程对象的流。Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages flowing through the channel as well as the stream used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object. 信道接收器链中的通道接收器提供程序，链接在一起，并且所有通道消息在序列化和传输消息之前都流过此接收器链。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain of channel sink providers, and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is serialized and transported. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的实现接口。The following code example illustrates an implementation of the interface. [!code-cpp[Remoting_Sinks#60](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Sinks/CPP/serversink.cpp#60)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_Sinks#60](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Sinks/CS/serversink.cs#60)] 请参阅接口对应的服务器接收器提供程序实现的一个示例的文档。See the interface documentation for an example of the corresponding server sink provider implementation.

permission.span: 用于操作基础结构代码。

span.span: for operating with infrastructure code.

span.span: Requests processing from the current sink of the response from a method call sent asynchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `state`参数包含已推送到通道接收器堆栈并与当前接收器关联的信息。The `state` parameter contains information that was pushed onto the channel sink stack and associated with the current sink. ## Examples [!code-cpp[CommonTransportKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CommonTransportKeys/CPP/commontransportkeys.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CommonTransportKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CommonTransportKeys/CS/commontransportkeys.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CommonTransportKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CommonTransportKeys/VB/commontransportkeys.vb#1)]

summary.span: 请求从当前接收器处理消息。

span.span: Requests message processing from the current sink.

returns.span: 一个 状态值，该值提供有关如何处理消息的信息。

span.span: A status value that provides information about how message was processed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代理作业是将转换为消息对象调用的方法调用。The job of a proxy is to convert a method call invoked on it into a message object. 此消息对象，该实现对象接口时，传递从客户端到服务器端通过调用对消息接收器对象。This message object, which implements the interface, is passed from the client end to the server end by invoking on message sink objects. 在每个消息接收器负责调用的意义上的消息的接收器链接在一起对下一个消息的接收器后它已执行其工作。Message sinks are chained together in the sense that every message sink is responsible for calling on the next message sink after it has performed its work. 例如，与同步相关的消息接收器可能会导致锁获取或发布，并进一步下游消息接收器然后委派。For instance, a synchronization-related message sink can cause a lock to be acquired or released, and then delegated further to the downstream message sink.
